author: dstreit
content:
Hey all, I'm working on an EIP to standardize an approach to splitting BIP-39 mnemonics into "shares" using Shamir's Secret Sharing Scheme. I've summarized the current state and open questions here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/erc-3450-standard-for-applying-shamirs-to-bip-39-mnemonics/5844/11

Any thoughts or feedback on it would be greatly appreciated! Thanks!
